mapper.sql: SYS_EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PWD, EMP_POSITION, EMP_LEVEL, EMP_MANAGER_ID, PHOTO, PAYMENT
mapper.insert: insert into EMPLOYEE (SYS_EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PWD, EMP_POSITION, EMP_LEVEL, EMP_MANAGER_ID, PHOTO, PAYMENT) values (#{sysEmpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empManagerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update EMPLOYEE
EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_PWD = #{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_POSITION = #{empPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_LEVEL = #{empLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMP_MANAGER_ID = #{empManagerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PHOTO = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT = #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SYS_EMP_ID = #{sysEmpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
